Kick-Bale Mini-Game
Hit a hay bale to score points.
You lose points each time a scarecrow hits the haystack.
The game ends if you go too far away from Digory's Farmstead.
Your bale-kicking skills earned you the top rank!
Your score earned you rank 2! You're almost at the top!
Your score earned you rank 3! You can do better!
Your score earned you rank 4! Try again!
Your score is...disappointing. But it's your first time, right? Right?

Pigling Rodeo Mini-Game
Piglings follow their attackers.
Be careful not to lose piglings to the swineherd bot.
The game ends if you go outside the fence.
Your pig-wrangling skills earned you the top rank!
Your score earned you rank 2! Come on! One more try!
Your score earned you rank 3! Need some more practice?

Drum Away Mini-Game
The drums will drive away the frogs.
Kill the ones in front!
Let's start!
Frogs are coming!
Beat a drum to drive away that color's frog.
You lose points if frogs reach the drums.
Drive away the frogs to win!
The drums will break if you hit them too much.
Your drumming skills earned you the top rank!
